name: TrainWay Text Adventure
description:
TrainWay is an text based train simulation game. You navigate around a world picking up jobs and dropping them off where they're need to go.

Disclaimer: For the pre-dev stage, there is only a small world consisting of 7 stations: A, B, C, D, E, F, and G.

On this page, the current latest version and the 2 previous ones will be available.

Development is going fast as the developers are stuck at home because of COVID-19.

Expectations should be a minor update every few hours, and a major one every day or so.
